pkgmetadata.longdescription: # xsarradarSat2 Level 1 python reader for efficient xarray/dask based processor# Install```conda install -c conda-forge xradarsat2``````pycon>>> import xradarsat2>>> folder_path = "/level1/root/directory">>> xradarsat2.rs2_reader(folder_path)DataTree('None', parent=None)├── DataTree('orbitAndAttitude')│ Dimensions: (timeStamp: 7)│ Coordinates:│ * timeStamp (timeStamp) datetime64[ns] 2010-10-15T21:01:32.370461 ... 2010...│ Data variables:│ yaw (timeStamp) float64 3.756 3.773 3.785 3.792 3.807 3.82 3.83│ roll (timeStamp) float64 -29.8 -29.8 -29.8 -29.8 -29.8 -29.8 -29.8│ pitch (timeStamp) float64 0.002605 0.002862 ... -0.001594 -0.001443│ xPosition (timeStamp) float64 -5.072e+06 -5.076e+06 ... -5.087e+06│ yPosition (timeStamp) float64 4.643e+06 4.676e+06 ... 4.799e+06 4.828e+06│ zPosition (timeStamp) float64 2.033e+06 1.944e+06 ... 1.584e+06 1.494e+06│ xVelocity (timeStamp) float64 -425.7 -352.1 -278.6 ... -131.8 -58.51 14.65│ yVelocity (timeStamp) float64 2.642e+03 2.58e+03 ... 2.324e+03 2.259e+03│ zVelocity (timeStamp) float64 -7.063e+03 -7.09e+03 ... -7.207e+03│ Attributes:│ attitudeDataSource: Downlink│ attitudeOffsetsApplied: true│ Description: Attitude Information Data Store.
